#How to setup chroot environment.

= Chroot Setup Steps =

   # Install the required packages:
        * sudo apt-get install dchroot
        * sudo apt-get install debootstrap
   # Create the directory to be the jail:
        * sudo mkdir -p /ae/jail 
   # Configure schroot:
        * sudo vi /etc/schroot/schroot.conf
   # Next add the following to the end of the /etc/schroot/schroot.conf file:
        * [precise]
        * description=Precise Pangolin
        * location=/ae/jail
        * priority=3
        * users=ae
        * groups=ae
        * root-groups=root
   # Install the OS into the jail:
        * sudo debootstrap --variant buildd --arch i386 precise /ae/jail http://mirrors.rit.edu/ubuntu
   # Cross mount /proc but not recommended for security reasons:
        * sudo mount -o bind  /proc  /ae/jail/proc
   # Create a user for chrrot
        * useradd ravi
        * mkdir -p /ae/jail/home/ae
        * chown ae:ae /ae/jail/home/ae
   # Go inside chroot
        * sudo chroot /ae/jail
   # Install necessary packages:
        * apt-get install vim
        * apt-get install net-tools
        * apt-get install libssl-dev
        * apt-get install apparmor
        * apt-get install apparmor-profiles
